Method.name: GetCertificate
Method.Description: Get SSL Configuration by Server as a name for configuration
Method.Implementation:
new $namespace zn "%SYS" quit:##class(Security.SSLConfigs).Exists(Server) Server
do { set tSC=##class(Security.SSLConfigs).Create(Server) $$$ThrowOnError(tSC) } while 0
quit Server
